Package com.github.blackrush.acara

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventBus
    An EventBus is Publishable and Subscribable
    EventMetadataBuilder  
    ListenerBuilder  
    Publishable
    Publishable is the super-interface taking care about publishing events.
    Subscribable
    Subscribable is the super-interface taking care about subscriptions of listeners.
    Subscription
    A Subscription is a handle to further un-subscribe yourself.
